[30;1m557 | [0m[35m- **Provided by**: dynaconf_[0m
[30;1m558 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m559 | [0m[35mLocation of an API server configuration file to load settings from.[0m
[30;1m560 | [0m[35mThe API server will generate a default configuration file at[0m
[30;1m561 | [0m[35m``~/.ara/server/settings.yaml`` that you can use to get started.[0m
[30;1m562 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m563 | [0m[35mNote that while the configuration file is in YAML by default, it is possible[0m
[30;1m564 | [0m[35mto have configuration files written in ``ini``, ``json`` and ``toml`` as well.[0m

[30;1m30 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m31 | [0m[35mHowever, since write concurrency does not scale very well with sqlite, it might[0m
[30;1m32 | [0m[35mnot be a good fit if you plan on having a single API server handle data for[0m
[30;1m33 | [0m[35mmultiple ``ansible-playbook`` commands running at the same time.[0m
[30;1m34 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m35 | [0m[35mThe distributed sqlite database backend and WSGI middleware provide an[0m
[30;1m36 | [0m[35malternative to work around this limitation.[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m389[0m[34m of [0m[33m1089[0m[31m ]--[0m

[30;1m103 | [0m[35m        )[0m

[30;1m333 | [0m[35m      hosts even though the playbooks may have all run against 'localhost'.[0m

[30;1m617 | [0m[35m    [0m
[30;1m618 | [0m[35m    Because the hostname was not previously saved and can't be recovered retroactively,[0m
[30;1m619 | [0m[35m    playbooks that were recorded before the upgrade will have the controller set to 'localhost'.[0m

[30;1m1525 | [0m[35m      'python -m ara.setup.callback_plugins' will print the path to ARA's callback[0m
[30;1m1526 | [0m[35m      plugins.[0m

[30;1m28 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m29 | [0m[35mThis plugin gathers data as Ansible runs and sends it to a Django REST API server:[0m
[30;1m30 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m78 | [0m[35mThis plugin gathers data as Ansible runs and sends it to a Django REST API server:[0m
[30;1m79 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m70 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m71 | [0m[35mPlaybooks recorded by the ara callback can be given names or labels in order to make them easier to [0m
[30;1m72 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m73 | [0m[35mThey are set as ordinary Ansible variables and are evaluated at the beginning of each play.[0m
[30;1m74 | [0m[35mThey can be provided directly in playbook files:[0m
[30;1m75 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m76 | [0m[35m.. code-block:: yaml[0m

[30;1m68 | [0m[35mPlaybook names and labels[0m
[30;1m69 | [0m[35m~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[0m
[30;1m70 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m71 | [0m[35mPlaybooks recorded by the ara callback can be given names or labels in order to make them easier to [0m
[30;1m72 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m73 | [0m[35mThey are set as ordinary Ansible variables and are evaluated at the beginning of each play.[0m
[30;1m74 | [0m[35mThey can be provided directly in playbook files:[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m1036[0m[34m of [0m[33m1089[0m[31m ]--[0m
